Skip to Main Content
## Move over Champaign. This bottle is pure celebration! The floral aroma will transport you to a quaint flower shop in the middle of summer with hints of rose petals, lilac, and violet mingling gracefully. On the palate, you'll taste the delicious flavors of fresh cherries and raspberries with a subtle touch of refreshing lavender. This wine is a perfect choice for any joyful occasion, or just when you want to treat yourself to something special.
